articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: With iOS 19 on the way, Apple looks toward mobile gaming - TechCrunch
articles.description: Ahead of iOS 19, Apple is reportedly developing a new games app and acquiring the game developer RAC7, which makes the game Sneaky Sasquatch.
articles.content:
With Apple’s flagship Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) event a few weeks away, the company is signaling that it’s paying attention to the opportunity of mobile gaming.
Apple already has a subs… [+1222 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Elden Ring: Nightreign is an epic RPG squeezed into delicious bite-size capsules - Ars Technica
articles.description: Fast-paced multiplayer action fits surprisingly well with the old Elden Ring formula.
